actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the State of Oklahoma all rights, title, and interest of the United States in and to the Tenkiller Reservoir project.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey the Tenkiller Reservoir project to the State of Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the State of Oklahoma all rights, title, and interest of the United States in and to the Tenkiller Reservoir project.
